# Vendor Library Notices

This directory contains third-party libraries used by the ligi serve command.

- **Version**: 15.0.4
- **License**: MIT
- **Repository**: https://github.com/markedjs/marked

## mermaid.js

- **Version**: 11.4.1
- **License**: MIT

## highlight.js

- **Version**: 11.9.0
- **License**: BSD-3-Clause

Each library is distributed under its respective license listed above. Please include the relevant copyright and license notices when redistributing these assets.
